name: Breakout (itch) (Joe Gamble)
description:
Hi There! This is our submission for the PlymGamesDev Game Jam,  Breakout. Breakout is a game about stealth and strategy, as you use the environment to navigate the prison undetected.

The object of the game is to collect all the tools before using them to escape.

Developers:

Jake Powell, Miles Hoyland, Joe Gamble

Credits: 

BetelgeuseMan
Jannie
Broken Vector
PixelHole
